Up.Statement:
if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) drop table [dbo].[w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis] GO /* ========================================================================================================= Module : 定期購入継続分析テーブル (w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.sql) ･･･････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････････ Copyright : Copyright W2 Co.,Ltd. 2017 All Rights Reserved. ========================================================================================================= */ CREATE TABLE [dbo].[w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis] ( [data_no] [bigint] IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [user_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [product_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [variation_id] [nvarchar] (60) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [count] [int] NOT NULL, [order_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [fixed_purchase_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [status] [nvarchar] (10) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [date_created] [datetime] NOT NULL DEFAULT (getdate()), [date_changed] [datetime] NOT NULL DEFAULT (getdate()), [last_changed] [nvarchar] (20) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N'') ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [data_no] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
CREATE INDEX [IX_w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis_1] ON [dbo].[w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis]([user_id], [product_id], [variation_id]) ON [PRIMARY] GO
CREATE INDEX [IX_w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis_2] ON [dbo].[w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis]([product_id], [variation_id]) ON [PRIMARY] GO
CREATE INDEX [IX_w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis_3] ON [dbo].[w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis]([variation_id]) ON [PRIMARY] GO
CREATE INDEX [IX_w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis_4] ON [dbo].[w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis]([order_id]) ON [PRIMARY] GO
truncate table w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis
/* 注文 */ insert into w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis (user_id, product_id, variation_id, count, order_id, fixed_purchase_id, status, date_created, date_changed, last_changed) select distinct w2_Order.user_id, w2_OrderItem.product_id, w2_OrderItem.variation_id, ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by w2_Order.user_id, w2_OrderItem.product_id, w2_OrderItem.variation_id order by w2_Order.order_date, w2_Order.date_created ) as count, w2_Order.order_id, w2_Order.fixed_purchase_id, case w2_Order.order_status when 'SHP_ARGD' then '20' when 'SHP_COMP' then '20' else '10' end as status, getdate() as date_created, getdate() as date_changed, 'migration' as last_changed from w2_Order with(nolock) inner join w2_OrderItem with(nolock) on w2_OrderItem.order_id = w2_Order.order_id where w2_Order.order_status not in ('ODR_CNSL', 'TMP_CNSL') and w2_Order.fixed_purchase_id <> '' and w2_OrderItem.product_name like '#[定期#]%' escape '#' order by w2_Order.user_id, w2_OrderItem.product_id, w2_OrderItem.variation_id
/* 存在 */ insert into w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis (user_id, product_id, variation_id, count, order_id, fixed_purchase_id, status, date_created, date_changed, last_changed) select distinct w2_FixedPurchase.user_id, w2_FixedPurchaseItem.product_id, w2_FixedPurchaseItem.variation_id, 0 as count, '' as order_id, w2_FixedPurchase.fixed_purchase_id, '00' as status, getdate() as date_created, getdate() as date_changed, 'migration' as last_changed from w2_FixedPurchase with(nolock) inner join w2_FixedPurchaseItem with(nolock) on w2_FixedPurchase.fixed_purchase_id = w2_FixedPurchaseItem.fixed_purchase_id
/* 離脱 */ insert into w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis (user_id, product_id, variation_id, count, order_id, fixed_purchase_id, status, date_created, date_changed, last_changed) select w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.user_id, w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.product_id, w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.variation_id, max(w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.count) as count, '' as order_id, '' as fixed_purchase_id, '90' as status, getdate() as date_created, getdate() as date_changed, 'migration' as last_changed
from w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis with(nolock) where w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.status not in ('00') and not exists ( select * from w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis tmp where tmp.user_id = w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.user_id and tmp.product_id = w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.product_id and tmp.variation_id = w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.variation_id and tmp.status in ('00', '90') ) group by w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.user_id, w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.product_id, w2_FixedPurchaseRepeatAnalysis.variation_id
